name: pour
description: calculates the new content values after transferring maximum volume of liquid from one container to another without loosing any liquid
inputQuery: MATCH (from_Jar)-[:IN]->(c)<-[:IN]-(to_Jar) WHERE c.status='ToDo' AND from_Jar.content > 0 AND to_Jar.volume > to_Jar.content RETURN ID(c) AS contextID, c.step, from_Jar.name, from_Jar.volume, from_Jar.content, to_Jar.name, to_Jar.volume, to_Jar.content
